TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ItemAutomationPeer extends System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer implements class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IVirtualizedItemProvider
Public MustInherit Class ItemAutomationPeer Inherits AutomationPeer Implements IVirtualizedItemProvider
type ItemAutomationPeer = class inherit AutomationPeer interface IVirtualizedItemProvider

summary.span: Exposes a data item in an collection to UI Automation.

span.span: Exposes a data item in an collection to UI Automation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应同时的数据项类型不具有子级; 但是，他们可以存在树和相应[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]树。Data items that are not also types do not have children; however, they can have a tree and a corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree. 例如，可以具有包含数据项的字符串的集合。For example, a can have a collection of strings that contain data items. 这些项目通过在处理时可视化效果，为其创建树。When those items are processed by an for visualization, a tree is created for them. 此树可以具有相应[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]树。This tree can have a corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree. 创建树后，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]合并到树[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]树。After the tree is created, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] merges the tree into a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree. 适用于其对应项，如果存在，则可以获取有关的详细信息树。 works with its counterpart, if it exists, to obtain more information about the tree. 只有可见的数据项，或更确切地说，相应树，具有两个同级。Only visible data items, or more precisely, the corresponding trees, have this dualism. 非可见数据项，而不具有相应树，只能有一个。Non-visible data items, which have no corresponding trees, have only one .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将名称属性，就好像用户用来解释它们所引用的控件的文本字符串。You can think of the name property as if it were a string of text that users use to explain which control they are referring to. 请确保你有中的所有控件的文本表示形式[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)]以便你可以以编程方式引用到控件本地化的方式。Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner. 此方法由 调用。This method is called by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对应于中的数据项与此关联的集合。The corresponds to the data item in the collection that is associated with this . 此方法由 调用。This method is called by . 此方法不表示该元素是否可见。This method does not indicate whether the element is visible. 在某些情况下，元素将显示在屏幕上，但却仍不可见。In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible. 例如，如果元素被遮盖其他元素，则它可能不可见。For example, if the element is obscured by other elements, it might not be visible. 在这种情况下，该方法返回`false`。In this case, the method returns `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
